subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jeff Novitzky, the federal agent at the heart of investigations into the use of performance-enhancing drugs by athletes for six years, has been moved to the periphery of the Roger Clemens investigation.
snippet: Jeff Novitzky, the federal agent at the heart of investigations into the use of performance-enhancing drugs by athletes for six years, has been moved to the periphery of the Roger Clemens investigation.
